mobile.name: wizard
mobile.long_description: A wizard walks around behind the counter, talking to himself.
mobile.description: The wizard looks old and senile, and yet he looks like a very powerful wizard. He is equipped with fine clothing, and is wearing many fine rings and bracelets.

mobile.name: baker
mobile.long_description: The baker looks at you calmly, wiping flour from his face with one hand.
mobile.description: A fat, nice looking baker. But you can see that he has many scars on his body.

mobile.name: grocer
mobile.long_description: A grocer stands at the counter, with a slightly impatient look on his face.
mobile.description: A tall grocer, who moves two 200 pounds bag of flour around on his shoulders.

mobile.name: weaponsmith
mobile.long_description: A weaponsmith is standing here.
mobile.description: He is a young weaponsmith, who still has lots to learn but he is still eager to sell you his latest implements of carnage and destruction.

mobile.name: armourer
mobile.long_description: An armourer stands here displaying his new (and previously owned) armours.
mobile.description: An old but very strong armourer. He has made more suits of armour in his life than you have ever seen.

mobile.name: receptionist
mobile.long_description: A receptionist is standing behind the counter here, smiling at you.
mobile.description: You notice a tired look in her face. She looks like she isn't paid well enough to put up with any crap from mud players with attitudes.

mobile.name: captain stolar
mobile.long_description: A retired captain stands here, selling boats.
mobile.description: This captain has eaten more sharks than you have killed peas.

mobile.name: sailor
mobile.long_description: A sailor stands here, waiting to help you.
mobile.description: He looks like a strong, fit sailor.

mobile.name: uncle juan
mobile.long_description: Uncle Juan is here ready to take your order.
mobile.description: He looks like he may or may not have a green card.

mobile.name: wally watermaster
mobile.long_description: Wally the Watermaster is standing behind the counter.
mobile.description: Wally is a bit pudgy but looks very strong. He has a glass of Midgaard Natural Spring Water in his hand. When he notices you, he proudly displays his fine collection of contemporary waters.

mobile.name: postmaster post master
mobile.long_description: The head postmaster is standing here, waiting to help you with your mail.
mobile.description: The Postmaster seems like a happy old man, though a bit sluggish. He worries about the reputation of the MMS (Midgaard Mail Service), as many people seem to think that it is slow. Perhaps if he were to brush the cobwebs from his uniform it would help to make a better impression.

mobile.name: guildmaster master mage
mobile.long_description: Your guildmaster is studying a spellbook while preparing to cast a spell.
mobile.description: Even though your guildmaster looks old and tired, you can clearly see the vast amount of knowledge she possesses. She is wearing fine magic clothing, and you notice that she is surrounded by a blue shimmering aura.

mobile.name: guildmaster master priest
mobile.long_description: Your guildmaster is prayer to your God here.
mobile.description: You are in no doubt that this guildmaster is truly close to your God; he has a peaceful, loving look. You notice that he is surrounded by a white aura.

mobile.name: guildmaster master beggar thief
mobile.long_description: A beggar is sitting here, could she be a guildmaster?
mobile.description: You realize that whenever your guildmaster moves, you fail to notice it - the way of the true thief. She is to be dressed in poor clothing, having the appearance of a beggar.

mobile.name: guildmaster master
mobile.long_description: Your guildmaster is standing here sharpening an axe.
mobile.description: This is your master. Big and strong with bulging muscles. Several scars across his body proves that he was using arms before you were born. He has a calm look on his face.

mobile.name: sorcerer
mobile.long_description: A sorcerer is guarding the entrance.
mobile.description: He is an experienced mage who has specialized in the field of Combat Magic. He is here to guard the Mage's Guild and his superior knowledge of offensive as well as defensive spells make him a deadly opponent.

mobile.name: knight templar
mobile.long_description: A knight templar is guarding the entrance.
mobile.description: He is a specially trained warrior belonging to the military order of the Faith. His duty is to protect the faithful from persecution and infidel attacks and his religious devotion combined with his superior skill makes him a deadly opponent.

mobile.name: assassin
mobile.long_description: An assassin is guarding the entrance.
mobile.description: He is a thief who has specialized in killing others as effectively as possible, using all sorts of weapons. His superior knowledge of how and where to use them combined with his extraordinary stealth makes him a deadly opponent.

mobile.name: knight
mobile.long_description: A knight is guarding the entrance.
mobile.description: He is an expert warrior who has attained knighthood through countless chivalrous deeds. His duty is to protect the Guild of Swordsmen and his extreme skill combined with his experience in warfare makes him a deadly opponent.

mobile.name: bartender
mobile.long_description: A bartender watches you calmly, while he skillfully mixes a drink.
mobile.description: A tired looking Bartender who hates trouble in his bar.

mobile.name: waiter
mobile.long_description: A waiter is going around from one place to another.
mobile.description: A tired looking waiter.

mobile.name: waiter
mobile.long_description: A man now leads a quiet, peaceful life as a waiter is standing here.
mobile.description: This man was obviously a famous sorcerer in his younger days as you instantly recognize his face.

mobile.name: waiter
mobile.long_description: A waiter who seems to have reached contact with his God is standing here.
mobile.description: This waiter almost makes you feel like you should drop to your knees and begin to worship your God. Naaah.

mobile.name: waiter
mobile.long_description: A waiter who knows where all his customers keep their money is standing here.
mobile.description: Hmmm... wonder where he got that coin he is playing with.

mobile.name: waiter
mobile.long_description: A waiter is here.
mobile.description: This guy looks like he could easily kill you while still carrying quite a few firebreathers.

mobile.name: filthy
mobile.long_description: Filthy is standing here, eager to serve you a special drink.
mobile.description: Filthy looks real, ehm, dirty. He likes to keep his customers happy, but do not mess with him or else he'll get upset.

mobile.name: keeper peacekeeper
mobile.long_description: A Peacekeeper is standing here, ready to jump in at the first sign of trouble.
mobile.description: He looks very strong and wise. Looks like he doesn't answer to ANYONE.

mobile.name: cityguard guard
mobile.long_description: A cityguard stands here.
mobile.description: A big, strong, helpful, trustworthy guard.

mobile.name: janitor
mobile.long_description: A janitor is walking around, cleaning up.
mobile.description: What a tough job he has.

mobile.name: fido dog
mobile.long_description: A beastly fido is mucking through the garbage looking for food here.
mobile.description: The fido is a small dog that has a foul smell and pieces of rotted meat hanging around his teeth.

mobile.name: mercenary
mobile.long_description: A mercenary is waiting for a job here.
mobile.description: He looks pretty mean, and you imagine he'd do anything for money.

mobile.name: drunk
mobile.long_description: A singing, happy Drunk.
mobile.description: A drunk who seems to be too happy, and to carry too much money.

mobile.name: beggar
mobile.long_description: A beggar is here, asking for a few coins.
mobile.description: The beggar looks like she is fed up with life.

mobile.name: odif yltsaeb
mobile.long_description: An odif yltsaeb is here, walking backwards.
mobile.description: The odif is a small god that has been reversed by some dog.

mobile.name: cityguard guard
mobile.long_description: A cityguard is here, guarding the gate.
mobile.description: A big, strong, helpful, trustworthy guard.

mobile.name: green gelatinous blob
mobile.long_description: An oozing green gelatinous blob is here, sucking in bits of debris.
mobile.description: A horrid looking thing; it is huge, greenish, and looks like the blob.

mobile.name: pet shop boy
mobile.long_description: There is a Pet Shop Boy standing here cuddleing something furry in his hands.
mobile.description: As you look at him, he opens his hands to reveal a rat!

mobile.name: kitten
mobile.long_description: A small loyal kitten is here.
mobile.description: The kitten looks like a cute, little, fierce fighter.

mobile.name: puppy
mobile.long_description: A small loyal puppy is here.
mobile.description: The puppy looks like a cute, little, fierce fighter.

mobile.name: beagle
mobile.long_description: A small, quick, loyal beagle is here.
mobile.description: The beagle looks like a fierce fighter.

mobile.name: rottweiler
mobile.long_description: A large, loyal rottweiler is here.
mobile.description: The rottweiler looks like a strong, fierce fighter.

mobile.name: wolf
mobile.long_description: A large, trained wolf is here.
mobile.description: The wolf looks like a strong, fearless fighter.

mobile.name: cryogenicist cryo
mobile.long_description: The cryogenicist is here, playing with a canister of liquid nitrogen.
mobile.description: You notice a tired look in her face. She looks like she isn't paid well enough to put up with any crap from mud players with attitudes.
